title: You. Him. I.
description: Author Sarah DeRosa warmly encourages readers to leap into their own journey to healing alongside her in her first published collection of poetry, You. Him. I. DeRosa's poems explore her personal story of an abusive relationship in this refreshingly raw collection. The book is divided into three sections which cohesively paint a tale of heartbreak, mending, and everything in between. Diverse modern themes such as abuse, self image, coping, addiction, and love come alive in various poems.
author: Sarah DeRosa
